name: mothership-crew-relationships
description: Adds a crew relationship system to Mothership characters
author: Eddie Dover <ed@eddiedover.dev>

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r src/styles dist/styles && cp -r src/scripts dist/scripts && cp src/module.json dist/module.json
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../mothership-crew-relationships.zip . && cd ..
